column2: "Hɔ esukɔnndua no do Na yɛdze hɛn nsankutsen sensɛnee."
"Na hɔ na hɔn a wɔfaa hɛn ndɔmmum no bisaa hɛn hɔ ndwom
column3: Na hɔn a wɔmaa yɛfɔnee no bisaa hɛn hɔ enyigye
column5: Hom ntow Zion ndwom kor nkyerɛ hɛn."

column2: "Ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛbɔtow EWURADZE no ndwom Wɔ ananabea?"

column3: sɛ mo werɛ fir wo a
column4: Ma m’abanyimfa nngura wɔ mu ho."

column3: Sɛ mannkaa wo a; Na sɛ mammpɛ Jerusalɛm Annkyɛn m’enyikadze tsitsir a."

column4: kaa Jerusalɛm da no Fa tsia Edommba no; Hɔn a wɔkaa dɛ
column7: Nkodu ne fapem do mpo no."

column3: Babilɔn babaa a wɔrebɛsɛɛ wo; Nhyira nka nyia otua wo kaw Dɛ mbrɛ edze ayɛ hɛn no."

column2: "Nhyira nka nyia osuo wo nkɔkowaba mu Dze hɔn hwehwe ɔbotan no."
